name: Kanojo no Inakunatta
nutshell: During a fight, she left the house. But I won't chase after her, because if I just wait a while, she will always return home. But what will happen now that has disappeared, leaving behind only a single, scrap of paper…?

name: Adam no Junjou
nutshell: Kazuma is a shy high-schooler who happens to be gay, and in love with a popular and handsome guy,Ayase! A while later, Ayase befriends Kazuma, having found out that Kazuma is gay, and admits that he too is gay, and has the same feelings for Kazuma! Yet all Ayase does is have sex with Kazuma, causing Kazuma to feel insecure, will this relationship work out, or will Kazuma's and Ayase's heart fall apart?

name: Maximum The Hormone!! Outsider Advertising Agency
nutshell: Hormone's revolutionary new work published as a "new song CD + one manga" book, Let's talk about the future of noodle katakotteri. (これからの麺カタコッテリの話をしよう―)

name: Huan Jing Shaonü Alice
nutshell:
Crisis in Wonderland! Alice goes through the looking glass once again.
Wonderland has been invaded by a mechanical legion. Alice, who has the ability to shrink and grow at will, returns once again to the fantasical world, embarking on an adventure to battle for the space-time pocketwatch!
Baidu Page

name: Harry Potter - Komorebi (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Snape/Draco
PWP Snaco doujin, set (presumably) during summer break after the end of OotP

name: Love Live! - Naisho ni shite tte Itta yan (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Eli x Nico x Nozomi doujin.

name: Rebirth
nutshell:
What would you do if you are given a second chance to turn back time and relive your past?
Would you do what you did back then for fear of the butterfly effect?
Or would you take a different course of action and let the future speaks for itself?
Links:

Author's Twitter
Author's Patreon

name: My Sky '03
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Ippei Yasuda travels all over Japan in order to find a suitable spouse who is recognized by all members of his family to be the heir to the Yasuda Zaibatsu, a super giant conglomerate. While living such a life of travel, Ippei Yasuda is arrested for possession of methamphetamine!
The conflict between Ippei, who has no memory of the crime, and the police, who assume from the start that he is the culprit, only deepens. The situation is so entrenched that Ippei is on the verge of exploding...!
Mangaka Hiroshi Motomiya presents a new "My Sky" series from a contemporary perspective.

name: Tweening
nutshell: A story about Caroline Manson, an Indonesian girl that got a scholarship in Rouge Academy of Art on Digital animation major. There she met Nathaniel Aldrich, a third year student in Classical Piano major. Carol asked Nathan to be the background music composer for carol’s animation movie. This is the story of their journey to reach their dream and also their university romance life.

name: Wandering Bride
nutshell:
"Do you choose obedience or death?"
Born within the Lascaris Empire, which once stood at the pinnacle of success and glory, is the story of one princess who was condemned by all for her commoner lineage. No stranger to ill treatment from those around her, Irene, the princess of the Lascaris Empire, was seen only as the result of the infidelity between the late emperor and her dancer of a mother.
One fateful day, she was ordered to be wed and act as a hostage to ward off an invasion from their enemy nation, the Kingdom of Farooq. When she refused and planned to escape, it led to the death of her closest cousin. With vengeance etched in her heart, she was sent to the Kingdom of Farooq with a grudge against her mother country as she appeared before the King.
King Jafar, with his jet black hair and those striking amber eyes.
On the same night she was welcomed as a consort of a foreign land, Irene pointed a sword at Jafar…?!
Unable to see the true motive behind Irene’s assassination attempt, Jafar found himself drawn to her. He had to have her at all costs, even if it meant forcefully shortening the distance between them…
(Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)

name: Genma Taisen Rebirth
nutshell: the surface of a fragment of a celestial body that was once called the "moon" . His name is Warrior Vega. A new battle begins for Vega and his friends who continue to fight against the cosmic destroyer "Genma"

name: Soaring Phoenix from the East Palace
nutshell: She is a venomous demon of a consort in the eyes of the world. On the wedding day, she snatches someone else's husband, scaring the wife into unconsciousness. The princess consort of North chen has an arrogant name, domineering Chang'an. But this world just happens to have someone more arrogant than her. Even when everyone condemns her, he only says: "I dote on the princess consort, what business is it of yours?" A strong woman and a strong man make for a strong alliance.

name: Koi Shitemasen!
nutshell: After trying for so long to change himself from the person he was in university and leave behind the painful memory of unrequited love, why does the very person Nakajima wanted to forget the most have to appear before him now?

name: Mr. Monster
nutshell:
Sometimes words are unnecessary.

Notes:
MD doesn't allow raws, this has no words to translate, ergo any uploads are raws. Go read it on Pixiv.

name: Studying Emperor
nutshell:
A science student who dislikes mathematics, ‘Yeon-joo’, takes a time slip as an anticipated accident. When I open my eyes, there was a woman emperor who ruled the world! And a kite that became an Empress (Emperor)! “When I’m going to spoil a lot of these humans!”, “Anyway, now I can't even see the math test?!”

Links:

Original Webtoon (Bomtoon)
Original Webtoon (kakao)
Original Webtoon (RidiBooks)

name: Imadoki no Shishunki
nutshell:
Explosive Fairy Tale
Childhood friends, Danzou and Shou, run into a dangerous bump in their relationship when Danzou reaches puberty ahead of his smaller friend and begins to see him in a whole new way.


Undoubtedly Useless a Painful Season


A philosopher in Love
Shou-chan and Danzou's friendship is still damaged, but being assigned to give Danzou his homework gives them a chance to build back some sort of normal relationship. Will Shou-chan be able to forgive Danzou for all he's done to him?


Follow-up


Awakening Puberty


An Eyeful and a Handful (Lots and Lots)


Going into Overtime


Afterword

name: Hinemosu no Tari Kimi to Boku
nutshell: Naoyuki is a kindhearted person who likes to take care of others. Unfortunately, his hopeless romantic nature often ends in rejections, and his bad taste in men leads him to untrustworthy lovers with bad taste. Meanwhile, Naoyuki’s childhood friend and next door neighbor Yowu continues to harbor a one-sided crush for him, and watches sadly from the sidelines…

name: Chou no Michiyuki
nutshell:
Maruyama, Nagasaki's pleasure district —
where the music of shamisens mingles with the language of foreign lands.
From artist Kan Takahama comes a tale of love and death:
a beautiful courtesan, a man on his deathbed, and their secret past…
Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2016.

name: Atarashii Joushi wa Dotennen
nutshell: The workplace comedy's story follows a 26-year-old office worker named Momose. He recently changed jobs after his previous boss harassed him. He's worried his new boss will also use power harassment to make his life miserable. Momose is trying to hide his anxious stomach when he first meets his new boss Shirosaki, however he's surprised to find his new boss is such a natural airhead that he eliminates all of Momose's anxiety.

name: There Can’t Be Girls In My Guild!
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Video Games,Harem,School Life,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: In reality, Li Yu, who is an introverted otaku, is a senior player of MMORPG "Star Trails ol". The elite guild where he belongs is nicknamed the "Geek Group" because the characters in the game are all male. Li Yu, who has been worrying about this, only accidentally learned a long time later that he is actually the only boy in the group. All the other members are actually beautiful girls with their own cute attributes, and they all have a deep connection with him

name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha ViVid - Tadashii Debaisu no Tsukai Kata (Doujinshi)
Renata Tate: Goddess for Hire
nutshell: Renata, a once almighty goddess, has returned in the modern day and must do odd jobs to earn offerings in order to restore her powers and save the world from an incoming monster uprising.

name: Ibara no Okite
nutshell: Earl Craven’s territory is laden with rules to abide – when the earl himself walks in the hallway, all servants present should turn their back on him, avoiding his gaze, which is why even his servants call him “the devil”… except for one. Priscilla is a maid in Earl Robert Craven’s abode and is the only one who captured the young earl’s tender heart. But what happens when a rich woman comes and calls the earl her future husband for the sake of business? Will their love prevail, or will their social status hinder them? This is a story about the struggles and trials of the star-crossed lovers.

name: Tale of the Nameless Children — NoNameD
nutshell: A student disappears suddenly and in his place a mysterious note is found. This is the beginning of the unbelievable things to come in the future.

name: Flash! Kimengumi
nutshell: A group of 5 male high school students that call themselves the funny-face group cause trouble at school with their crazy antics.

name: Sailor Moon - Season of Endings (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Haruka x Michiru

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Suiheisen no, Fumizuki
nutshell: Part of the Kantai Collection franchise. Serialized in Comptiq. The girls of the 22nd Destroyer Division (Fumizuki, Satsuki, Minazuki, Nagatsuki) have been training day and night. Now a massive exercise has begun to choose the best Destroyer Division among the torpedo squadrons…!

name: Maria of Granada
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Eva Shul, a former actress who spends her days in debauchery and drinking, is parted from her daughter Julie when she comes to tell her of her marriage.
After that, Eva continues to drink and play with young men, and is suddenly taken into a car by a group of men she doesn't know.
One of the men, Arthur, a film director, asks Eva to play the Virgin Mary in a movie about the life of Christ.
In addition to the title story, also includes the following oneshots:

Sound of Bamboo (竹の音, Take no Oto) - A girl finds herself caring for a samurai, the son of the enemy family who killed her father and brother. She wavers whether or not to avenge her fallen family...
Ballerina (バレリーナ, exclusive to the digital edition/original release)
Edelweiss (エーデルワイス, excluded from digital edition but available in other releases)

name: Morioh's Late Night Mystery
nutshell:
Oi, Josuke! Why do I wake up feeling so tired?!
COULD THIS BE THE WORK OF AN ENEMY 「STAND」? !
